'''The Fruit of Reason's Culmination''' is [[Nahida]]'s [[Level 6 Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|particles|Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion|3}}
** This particle generation has a cooldown of '''7''' seconds, which is shared with the particle generation from Nahida's regular [[All Schemes to Know|Tri-Karma Purification]].
* DMG dealt by Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion is affected by the [[DMG Bonus]] and [[CRIT Rate]] provided by Nahida's [[Awakening Elucidated|4th Ascension Passsive]].
